A good time killer - really not too much to say.  The classes make the game more unique. Most of the maps require people who can aim and play all the classes properly. Otherwise nothing will be accomplished, community thrives though matches can always be found. - Tends to get dull once maxed unless achievement hunting is your thing.
Everything is so simple when you have a rocket launcher for an arm!

Killing Floor is an awesome game, with its Zeds, its guns, and its semi-realism. The maps are pretty cool, the community-made ones cool as well (I'm lookin' at you, Doom 2 map), and the Summer/Halloween/Christmas events mix things up a bit, giving the Zeds new skins, as well as giving you chances to get specific achievements, to unlock certain characters.


A tip: Use weapons that your class affects, it'll make the waves that much easier to kill.
Another tip: Wait to go after the "kill x number of Zeds in one Zed-Time chain" achievements until after you're Commando lv3/Berserker lv2. Or you could use the Chainsaw. Either or.
trust me u want this game
If you haven't bought this already...DO IT! One of the best games on Steam!

Интересная вариация на тему Left 4 Dead, в чём то даже превосходящая оригинал. Рекомендуется к ознакомлению всем, кому по душе командный Survival Horror, притом именно Survival в самом прямом смысле - то есть на выживание, так как выжить, как раз таки, ой как не просто. От меня 8/10
Nice community, nice game.
DOSHDOSHDOSHDOSHDOSHDOSHDOSHDOSHDOSHDOSHDOSHDOSHDOSHDOSH

Many many monsters that change themes during Summer, Holloween, and Christmas, Class based Co-Op, a bunch of (free) maps, variation of difficulties, old school Unreal Engine 2 that works on most machines...Just get it already.
coooooolllll!!!!!!!!!!!!

The best CO-OP game I have played in many years.
First person zom.. err "specimen" survival horror shooter par excellence. :)

> No story, just fast multiplayer fun
> Oldschool style shooter gearing towards hardcore gameplay
> No crosshairs, just iron/combat sights
> Teamplay is essential on harder difficulties
> No hand-holding by the game. Kill (a LOT) or die trying.
> Very easy to learn, very hard to master

Pro:
+ Insanely satisfying gunplay with good feedback
+ Decent graphics with good performance thanks to modded UnrealEngine 2.5
+ Good sound
+ Good selection of weapons. Also, chainsaws!
+ Great selection of maps and mods, thanks to great community support
+ Very accessible. Start game, click go, GO!
+ DOSH!

Con:
- No campaign (if that's important to you)
- Leveling up your perks can be a bit grind-ish, but what isn't these days..
- Random Pubserver idiots WILL get your team killed on suicidal+
- Performance can drop a bit if there's a LOT going on

BUY IT! ;)
If you like Left 4 Dead serie, you'll enjoy this game!!! Killing Floor is a must!
Its awesome!
Best game ever! You will never get bored of this game. Trust me. :D

muito bom

This is definitly the best zombie fps out there... The level of skill and teamwork required to complete the level is very fun and something funny is always bound to happen XD... A MUST if u have close steam friends... or if u want to make new ones... 10/10 Well done to all the devolopers of Killing Floor!!

This game is a riot!! They keep updating, with awesome additions, timely-themed enemies, and great, non-stop action. Pure fun, regardless of what time of year. More weapons, more maps, more unlockable achievements throughout the year, LOTS of options....and tie-ins from other games like Team Fortress or Red Orchestra make it the game that keeps on giving! Wild colors feed the eye-candy graphics, and have me using it to calm myself on bad days....boss on Ur butt? kill a clown...bad breakup? Kill a puking clown! Get my drift?  Get Killing Floor!! Worth it!!!

Its an addicting horror shooter, pitting you and your friends against waves of monsters. Great perks (classes) to choose from and a wide array of guns to blast these horrifying baddies across a great selection of maps. Worth the buy, get it while you can.

This game is amazing, it requires skill, teamwork and tactic to win.
RPG Elements(Leveling Up, Classes) make this game even more fun and enchance teamwork as other people Heal better than others. Choose classes carefully!
Tripwire does AMAZING work on this game, in my eyes they deserve more.
They update Killing Floor for Free, (All the DLC's they make are just Character Packs, And give no advantage.) as they add Free Content about every Summer and Winter, even changing the skins to look awesome (Example Chainsaw mob Scrake is now a Monkey wearing chainsaw with Disturbing Voice lines such as "Not a single fuck was given that day".
And the Bugs and Glitches usuallly get fixed very swiftly. Tripwire is awesome!

TL,DR; This game is amazing, get it now or GTFO.
It's a pretty fun game and SSoHPKC plays it so it must be good.
If you want mindless, balls-to-the-walls fun, this game is for you. It's got everything you need, infected, big guns, thick british accents and DOSH. Grab it while it's hot.

Survival horror with holiday themed events and skins for the experiments? Super action packed waves with loads of edge of your seat moments? Running around as the last one alive mumbling "fuck fuck fuck fuck" while being chased by a crazed experiment called the Patriarch?

Killing Floor has all of that. Great game and loads of fun to spend hours playing. Especially with friends!

Awesome that a 3 year old game is still supported and has lost none of its fun.

It's a co-op zombie shooter ( you can play SP if you want) that still entertains.  Is it a bit gory? Sure but so are most zombie shooters.  It's a great casual FPS and the regular holiday updates keep the content fresh.

If this game has anything going for it it's simplicity.  Don't take it too seriously and you'll have a lot more fun.  Ignore the leaderboards and drop into multiplayer once in awhile to level up your profile if you want but you don't have to if you want to just enjoy a "casual" FPS experience.
It's raining money!!

Some say that CoD Zombie modes are the best of their kind.  I say this game trumps them all.  A class system, tons of maps, mods, variety of weapons, and so much more makes this game rival that of the likes of other successful mods such as Team Fortress or Counter-Strike.
Mejor que L4D, más acción, engancha más y es más divertido

Killing Floor is a fun (co-op) survival FPS that's pretty much a mix of Counter Strike: Source and Left 4 Dead. Survive waves of enemies, buy weapons every round, kill the final boss, and level-up your preferred class(es). While some may like L4D more than KF, the latter has much more lasting appeal because of the huge amount of maps and mods available online.
